publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2340 Ms Sandra White: Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the World Wheelchair Curling Champions, Scotland, on their outstanding victory at Braehead during the World Wheelchair Curling finals; further notes the excellent example set by Scotland’s World Wheelchair Curling team for both disabled and able-bodied athletes throughout the country; notes that the sport will be part of the Winter Paralympics for the first time in Turin later this year, and wishes Scotland’s winning team all the best in that event.

S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Campbell Martin*, Fiona Hyslop*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Tricia Marwick*, Phil Gallie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Irene Oldfather*, Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rob Gibson*, Bruce Crawford*, Eleanor Scott*, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Bill Butler*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Dr Jean Turner*, Iain Smith*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Frances Curran*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2340 Congratulations to the World Wheelchair Curling Champions - Scotland (lodged on 28 January 2005) John Swinburne*
